sources.title: The Film Fan (1939)
sources.description: On the way over to get some food from the grocery store, Porky enters a theatre offering free admittance to kids. On screen are shown clips of previous cartoons and some theatrical gags.

metadata.Plot: Porky Pig is on his way to the store to pick up some groceries for his mother when he walks by a sign saying that the local movie theater is having a "kids admitted free" day. The excited Porky rushes in and views a series of spoofs of newsreels, movie trailers, feature films, and even the Lone Ranger!
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, The Rhythmettes, Billy Bletcher
